amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.__. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Department of Defense or any other Federal agency to lease or purchase new light duty vehicles, for any executive fleet, or for an agency's fleet inventory, except in accordance with Presidential Memorandum-Federal Fleet Performance, dated May 24, 2011.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Deparment of Defense or any other Federal agency to lease or purchase new light duty vehicles, for any executive fleet, or for any agency's fleet inventory, except in accordance with Presidential Memorandum-Federal Fleet Performance, dated May 24, 2011.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Engel.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.
